select ssi.id, ssi.space_id, ssi.status, si.name as spaceName, si.`space` as spaceAddress, si.code, si.images, si.price from space_status_info ssi left join space_info si on (si.id = ssi.space_id) where 1 = 1
AND si.name LIKE CONCAT('%',#{spaceInfo.spaceName},'%')
AND si.code LIKE CONCAT('%',#{spaceInfo.code},'%')
order by si.create_date desc
